feature.label: Modelepedia Core Extensions
feature.provider-name: Software Engineering Group, University of Toronto
feature.description: MMINT provides a mega-modeling workbench to handle collections of related models and describe the relationships that exist among them. Users can plug in their own languages (model types, relationship types, operators, editors) and work with them through Model Interconnection Diagrams. Mega-models can be used to support the development, comprehension, validation, consistency, evolution and reuse of sets of related models.
